about_the_game:
From Nava is a 2D action puzzle game, set in the remains of a mysterious laboratory. You are equipped with only a seemingly ordinary pen that possesses the extraordinary ability to unleash magic attacks by drawing specific patterns. You must escape from this abandoned research laboratory by gathering all the keys and polaroids left behind in the aftermath of an unknown incident. Navigate through all 9 sectors using spells learned from fighting enemies or interacting with nearby objects. Various monsters and puzzles are all that stand in your way from fulfilling a stranger's final wish and unravel the mysteries of the world and yourself.

Features
  • 2D Movement and Action
  • Casting Spells by Drawing Specific Patterns
  • Customizable Patterns
  • 9 Areas
  • 5 Secret Rooms
  • 5 Main Spells
  • Detailed Pixel Art
  • Various Puzzles with Multiple Solutions
  • Assortment of Collectables
  • Achievements

This game is best played with a mouse and keyboard.
